item.title: Personal Notes on RNA-seq
item.description: 1 Trimming 2 Mapping 2.1 STAR 1 Trimming 2 Mapping 2.1 STAR The --outSAMstrandField intronMotif option adds an XS attribute to the spliced alignments in the BAM ﬁle, which is required by Cufﬂinks for unstranded RNA-seq data (Dobin and Gingeras 2015). Dobin, Alexander, and Thomas R. Gingeras. 2015. “Mapping RNA-Seq Reads with STAR.” Current Protocols in Bioinformatics 51 (1): 11.14.1–19. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1002/0471250953.bi1114s51.
